name: Burning Blood
description: At the end of the combat, heal 6 HP.
fun_fact: Your body's own blood burns with undying rage.

description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.

name: Cracked Core
description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Lightning orb.
fun_fact: The mysterious life force which powers the Automatons within the Spire. It appears to be cracked.

name: Pure Water
description: At the start of each combat, add 1 Miracle card into your hand.

name: Akabeko

name: Anchor

description: The first time you lose HP each combat, draw 3 cards.

name: Juzu Bracelet

name: Potion Belt
description: Upon pickup, gain 2 Potion slots.

description: Enemies in Elite rooms have 25% less HP.

name: Regal Pillow
description: Heal an additional 15 HP when you Rest.
fun_fact: Now you can get a proper night's rest.

name: Smiling Mask
description: The merchant's card removal service now always costs 50 Gold.

name: Strawberry
description: Raise your Max HP by 7

name: The Boot
description: Whenever you would deal 4 or less unblocked Attack damage, increase it to 5.

name: Tiny Chest
description: Every 4th ? room is a Tresure room.

name: Toy Ornithopter
description: Whenever you use a potion, heal 5 HP.

name: Vajra
description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Strength.

name: War paint
description: Upon pick up, Upgrade 2 random Skills.

name: Whetstone
description: Upon pick up, Upgrade 2 random Attacks.

name: Red Skull

description: Whenever you apply Poison, apply an additional 1 Poison

description: Start each combat with 1 Focus

name: Damaru
description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Mantra.

description: Curse cands now be played. Playing a Curse will make you lose 1 HP and Exhausts the card.

name: Bottled Lightning

name: Bottled Tornado
description: Upon pick up, choose a Skill card. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand.
fun_fact: The bottle gently hums and whirs.

name: Darkstone Periapt
description: Whenever you obtain a Curse, increase your Max HP by 6
fun_fact: The stone draws power from dark energy, converting it into vitality for the wearer.

description: For every 5 cards in your deck, heal 3 HP whenever you enter a Rest Site.

name: Frozzen Egg
description: Whenever you add a Power card to your deck, it is Upgraded.
fun_fact: The egg lies inert and frozen, never to hatch.

name: Gremlin Horn
description: Whenever an enemy dies, gain 1 Energy and draw 1 card.

name: Horn Cleat
description: At the start of your turn, gain 14 Block

name: Ink Bottle
description: Whenever you play 10 cards, draw 1 card.
fun_fact: Once exhausted, appears to refill itself in a different color.

name: Kunai
description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Dexterity
fun_fact: A blade favored by assasins for its lethality at range.

name: Letter Opener
description: Every time you play 3 Skills in a single turn, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.
fun_fact: Unnaturally sharp.

name: Matryoshka

name: Meat on the Bone
description: If your HP is at or below 50% at the end of combat, heal 12 HP.

name: Mercury Hourglass
description: At the start of your turn, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
fun_fact: An enchanted hourglass that endlessly drips.

name: Molten Egg
description: Whenever you add an Attack card to your deck, it is Upgraded.
fun_fact: The egg of a Phoenix. It glows red hot with a simmering lava.

name: Mummified Hand
description: Whenever you play a Power card, a random card in your hand costs 0 that turn.

name: Ornamental Fan

fun_fact: The fan seems to extend and harden as blood is spilled.

name: Pantograph
description: At the start of boss combats, heal 25 HP.

name: Pear
description: Raise your Max HP by 10
fun_fact: A common fruit before the Spireblight.

name: Question Card
description: Future card rewards have 1 additional card to choose from.
fun_fact: "Those with more choices minimize the downside to chaos." - Kublai the Great

name: Shuriken
description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Strength.
fun_fact: Lightweight throwing weapons. Recommend going for the eyes.

name: Singing Bowl
description: When adding cards to your deck, you may gain +2 Max HP instead.

name: Strike Dummy
description: Cards containing Strike deal 3 additional damage.
fun_fact: It's beat up.

name: Sundial
description: Every 3 times you shuffle your deck, gain 2 Energy.
fun_fact: "Early man's foolish obsession with time caused them to look to the sky for guidance, hoping for something permanent." - Zoroth

name: The Courier
description: The merchant no longer runs out of cards, relics or potions and his prices are reduced by 20%.
fun_fact: The merchant's personal pet!

name: Toxic Egg
description: Whenever you add a Skill card to your deck, it is Upgraded.

name: White Beast Statue
description: Potions always drop after combat.
fun_fact: A small white statue of a creature you have never seen before.

name: Paper Phrog
description: Enemies with Vulnerable take 75% more damage rather than 50%.

name: Self-Forming Clay
description: Whenever you lose HP in combat, gain 3 Block next turn.
fun_fact: "Most curious! It appears to form itself loosely on my thoughts! Tele-clay?" - Ranwid

name: Ninja Scroll
description: Start each combat with 3 Shivs in hand.
fun_fact: Contains the secrets of assassination.

name: Paper Krane
description: Enemies with Weak deal 40% less damage rather than 25%.
fun_fact: An origami of a creature from a past age.

name: Gold-Plated Cables
description: Your rightmost Orb triggers its passive an additional time.
fun_fact: "Interesting! Even automatons are affected by placebo." - Ranwid

name: Symbiotic Virus
description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Dark orb
fun_fact: A little bit of bad can do a lot of good.

name: Duality
description: Whenever you play an Attack, gain 1 temporarry Dexterity.
fun_fact: "And the sun was extinguished forever, as if curtains fell before it." - Zoroth

name: Teardrop Locket
description: Start each combat in Calm.
fun_fact: Its owner blind, its contents unseen.

name: Bird-Faced Urn
description: Whenever you play a Power, heal 2 HP.
fun_fact: This turn shows the crow god Mazaleth looking mischievous.

name: Calipers
description: At the start of your turn, lose 15 Block rather than all of your Block.
fun_fact: "Mechanical precision leads to greatness" - The Architect

name: Captain's Wheel
description: At the start of your 3rd turn, gain 18 Block.

name: Dead Branch
description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, add a random card to your hand.
fun_fact: The branch of a tree from a forgotten era.

name: Du-Vu Doll
description: For each Curse in your deck, start each combat with 1 additional Strength.
fun_fact: A doll devised to gain strength from malicious energy.

name: Fossilized Helix
description: Prevent the first time you would lose HP in combat.

name: Gambling Chip
description: At the start of each combat, discard any number of cards then draw that many.

name: Ginger
description: You can no longer become Weakened.

name: Girya
description: You can now gain Strength at Rest Sites. (3 times max)

name: Ice Cream
description: Energy is now conserved between turns.
fun_fact: Delicious!

name: Incense Burner
description: Every 6 turns, gain 1 Intangible.
fun_fact: The smoke imbues its owner with the spirit of the burned.

name: Lizard Tail
description: When you would die, heal to 50% of your Max HP instead (works once).
fun_fact: A fake tail to trick enemies during combat.

name: Mango
description: Raise your Max HP by 14
fun_fact: The most coveted forgotten fruit. Impeccably preserved with no signs of Spireblight.

name: Old Coin
description: Gain 300 Gold.
fun_fact: Unique coins are highly valued by Merchants for their historical value and rare metallic composition.

name: Peace Pipe
description: You can now remove cards from your deck at Rest Sites.
fun_fact: Clears the mind and cleanses the soul.

name: Pocketwatch
description: Whenever you play 3 or less cards during your turn, draw 3 additional cards at the start of your next turn.

name: Prayer Wheel

name: Thread and Needle
description: At the start of each combat, gain 4 Plated Armor.

name: Torii

name: Tungsten Rod
description: Whenever you would lose HP, lose 1 less.

name: Turnip
description: You can no longer become Frail.

name: Unceasing Top
description: Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw a card.

name: Wing Boots
description: You may ignore paths when choosing the next room to travel to 3 times.
fun_fact: Stylish.

name: Champion Belt
description: Whenever you apply Vulnerable, also apply 1 Weak.
fun_fact: Only the greatest may wear this belt.

name: Charon's Ashes
description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

name: Magic Flower
description: Healing is 50% more effective during combat.

name: Tough Bandages
description: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, gain 3 Block.
